front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks-- Audio Video Bridging (AVB) Systems-- Corrigendum 1: Technical and Editorial Corrections

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: virtual LANs. (The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the IEEE GET program http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/)
front.abstract: Technical and editorial errors identified by the IEEE 802.1 Working Groups maintenance activity are corrected in this corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.1BA-2011.
